job.title: Java Software Engineer
job.description:
Flex Payroll is looking for a software engineer to join our energetic team! This high performing group follows an Agile methodology, working together to get through though challenges and allowing the team to succeed! This full stack team works on a range of efforts within our Flex Client Facing application space. Tasks are assigned requiring skills in design, SQL, Java, JavaScript, Incidents, and/or anything in between. No worries if you are not an expert in everything; we focus on growing bench strength in everyone so there are no silos or dependencies on SMEs!
Paychex is dedicated to fostering a culture of intentional Inclusion and Diversity (I&D). Our valued employees and commitment to I&D is the essence of our internal and external success. Inclusivity is a key value of our corporate culture and is exemplified through our reputation as a top employer for employee development, diversity, and ethics, as well as a focus on fairness in recruitment, selection, and decision making.
Click here for more information on our corporate social responsibility.
